imdb.title: Kidô butoden ji Gandamu
imdb.plot: It is the year Future Century 60 and most of humanity has migrated to orbiting space colonies, leaving behind the polluted Earth. To prevent war, the colonies came up with the tournament known as the Gundam Fight. Every country bu...

episodes.title: Gundam Fight Begins! The Gundam That Fell to Earth
episodes.plot: Domon Kasshu, a young man who is the Gundam Fighter of Neo Japan, crashes his Gundam in Rome, Italy. Together with his girlfriend Rain Mikamura, he goes in search of his brother.

episodes.title: Roar of the Winning Punch
episodes.plot: Chibodee Crocket, the Gundam Fighter of Neo America, challenges Domon to a Gundam fight.

episodes.title: Beat the Dragon Gundam
episodes.plot: Domon goes to Neo China and gets approached to two Shaolin Monks who want him to fight the Gundam Fighter of Neo China.

episodes.title: Challenge! The Red Rose Knight
episodes.plot: Domon meets George de Sand, the Neo France Gundam Fighter.

episodes.title: Great Escape! The Captive Gundam Fighter
episodes.plot: While he is in Neo Russia, Domon goes off in search of the Gundam Fighter but gets arrested and finds out the inmates's have their Gundam's stolen and have their parts taken for to make there's stronger. Domon meets Argo Gulskii, the Neo Russia Gundam Fighter.

episodes.title: Fight, Domon! Earth Is the Ring
episodes.plot: Domon comes back to Neo Japan and finds out his brother is planning to use the Ultimate Gundam to take over Neo Japan.

episodes.title: Prepare to Fight! Desperate Fugitive
episodes.plot: Domon goes to Neo Mexico to fight Chico Rodriguez, Neo Mexico's Gundam Fighter..

episodes.title: An Old Grudge! Revenge of the Space Police
episodes.plot: Domon goes to Neo Canada to fight Gundam Fighter, Andrew Graham who has the Lumber Gundam.

episodes.title: Powerful Enemy! Chapman's Heroic Challenge
episodes.plot: Domon tries to defeat Neo England Gundam Fighter, Gentle Chapman to enjoys cheating in his Gundam fights.

episodes.title: Terror! The Phantom Fighter Appears
episodes.plot: Domon and Rain go to Neo Egypt to fight the Pharaoh Gundam XIII.

episodes.title: Reunion in the Falling Rain
episodes.plot: While in Neo Turkey, Rain runs into a old friend Saette Gyuzelle. He is the Neo Turkey Gundam Fighter and is possessed by DG Cells.

episodes.title: He's the Undefeated of the East! Master Asia Appears
episodes.plot: Rumors of the Devil Gundam / Dark Gundam appearing in Shinjuku send Domon and Rain to Neo Japan where they run into an army of Death Army mobile suits.

episodes.title: Big Trouble! Domon VS. The Big 5
episodes.plot: Domon and Master Asia go out to search for the survivors and Domon gets attacked by his friends who now serve the Dark Gundam / Devil Gundam.

episodes.title: George, Crush the Nightmare
episodes.plot: George has a nightmare of where he accidentally killed a mass amount of people in a Gundam fight so his butler, Raymond asks Domon and Rain for help.

episodes.title: Breakthrough! Strong Warrior Ties
episodes.plot: The Shuffle Alliance fight the Dark Army so they can give Domon and Rain some time to repair the Shining Gundam Mobile Suit.

episodes.title: Dazzling Power of the Clown! Get Mad, Gundam Maxter
episodes.plot: Domon and Rain find out that Chibodee has a fear of clowns.

episodes.title: Battle Royale Begins! Devil Gundam Revived
episodes.plot: The Battle Royale begins! All the remaining Gundams are placed on Lantau Island and will fight it out until there is only one left standing.

episodes.title: God Gundam's Great Triumph! A Hopeful Future... Ready, Go!
episodes.plot: Domon and the Shufle Alliance struggles to defeat the Devil (Dark) Gundam, and Rain is trapped inside it, he finds out he must tell Rain he loves her to get her to break free.
